#summary A road map of future versions of aspNETserve.


=== ~~Version 1.2.1~~ ===
Released June 26, 2008
 * A baseline release to provide a known starting grounds for future progress. (i.e., no real features or bug fixes over version 1.2)

----

Projected Release October 31, 2008
==== Bug Fixes ====
   * ~~[http://code.google.com/p/aspnetserve/issues/detail?id=1 HTTP Persistent Connections Unsupported]~~
   * ~~[http://code.google.com/p/aspnetserve/issues/detail?id=6 AspNetWork.GetProtocol() Is Unimplemented]~~

==== Enhancements ====
   * [http://code.google.com/p/aspnetserve/issues/detail?id=9 Windows Service Server]
   * [http://code.google.com/p/aspnetserve/issues/detail?id=10 Packaging Abilities]

Projected Release December 25, 2008
